verbose_text: MGAT4A encodes the glycosyltransferase N-acetylglucosaminyltransferase IVa, and catalyzes the transfer of N-acetylglucosamine (GlcNAc) from UDP-GlcNAc to the GlcNAcbeta1-2Mana1-3 arm of the N-glycan core via a beta1-4 linkage.
evidence: MGAT4A encodes the glycosyltransferase N-acetylglucosaminyltransferase IVa, and catalyzes the transfer of N-acetylglucosamine (GlcNAc) from UDP-GlcNAc to the GlcNAcbeta1-2Mana1-3 arm
